ticket.title: CLI episode session-status and work status: add protocol support

tickets.reason: ProtocolServer dispatchers must handle status queries.
Protocol clients provide the IPC transport.

in_scope: Add daemon-side handlers for SessionStatus and WorkStatus queries.
Wire handlers to session registry and work queue state.

steps: Add handlers to session and privileged dispatchers.
Replace PENDING_PROTOCOL_SUPPORT returns with actual implementations.

criteria: `apm2 work status <work-id>` returns work item details.
No PENDING_PROTOCOL_SUPPORT exit codes for these commands.

notes.files:
- crates/apm2-cli/src/commands/episode.rs (session-status at line ~801)
- crates/apm2-cli/src/commands/work.rs (status at line ~318)
- crates/apm2-cli/src/client/protocol.rs (add methods)
- crates/apm2-daemon/src/protocol/dispatch.rs (add handlers)
